title: saucectl xcuitest runner configuration
description: Configuration file for xcuitest using saucectl

xcuitest.description: Contains details specific to the XCUITest project.

app.description: Path to the application. Supports environment variables as values.

testApp.description: Path to the test application. Supports environment variables as values.

otherApps.description: A list of applications to be installed alongside the main app. Supports environment variables as values.

suites.description: The set of properties providing details about the test suites to run.

name.description: The name of the test suite, which will be reflected in the test results in Sauce Labs.

testOptions.description: Allows you to control various details on how tests are executed.

devices.description: Define details for running this suite on real devices.

id.description: Request a specific device for this test suite by its ID. You can look up device IDs in the Sauce Labs app or using our Devices API (https://docs.saucelabs.com/dev/api/rdc#get-devices).

name.description: Match the device name in full or partially (regex), which may provide a larger pool of available devices of the type you want.

platformVersion.description: The version of the iOS operating system.

options.description: Further specify desired device attributes within the pool of devices that match the name and version criteria.

carrierConnectivity.description: Limit the device selection to those that are connected to a cellular network.

deviceType.description: Limit the device selection to a specific type of device.

private.description: Limit the device selection to only match from your organization's private pool.
